actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Banking, Finance and Urban Affairs.

committees.committee: House Banking, Finance, and Urban Affairs

official_title: A bill to amend the act of August 16, 1973 (Public Law 93-100) to extend the moratorium on State taxation of federally insured depository institutions.

summary.text: Extends the moratorium on State taxation of federally insured depositary institutions until January 1, 1979.

titles.title: A bill to amend the act of August 16, 1973 (Public Law 93-100) to extend the moratorium on State taxation of federally insured depository institutions.
